summary: The actress Coral Browne travels to Moscow and meets a mysterious Englishman. It turns out that he's the notorious spy Guy Burgess.
cast: Alan Bates|Coral Browne|Charles Gray|Harold Innocent|Vernon Dobtcheff|Mark Wing-Davey|Douglas Reith|Peter Chelsom|Judy Gridley|Denys Hawthorne|Trevor Baxter|Roger Hammond|Alexei Jawdokimov|Matthew Sim|Molly Veness|Charles Lamb|Bibs Ekkel|Czeslaw Grocholski|Faina Zinova|Ljubima Woods|Helen Rapp|Lucy Dulyk|Yona Gailet|Margaret Lacey|Cole Henderson
title: An Englishman Abroad
